name: ai-chat-md-export
description: Convert ChatGPT and Claude chat history to readable Markdown files
author: Suguru Takahashi

scripts.test:quiet: bun test > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '‚úÖ All tests passed' || echo '‚ùå Tests failed - run "bun run test" for details'
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:e2e:npm && bun run test:e2e:binary
scripts.test:coverage:html: bun test --coverage && bunx @lcov-viewer/cli lcov coverage/lcov.info -o coverage/html
scripts.deps:size:prod: echo 'Package                                        Size    Visual' && echo '(Production dependencies only)' && echo && npm ls --omit=dev --all --depth=Infinity 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]+' | sed 's/[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]//g' | sed 's/@[0-9].*//' | grep -v '^$' | sort -u | while read pkg; do [ -d "node_modules/$pkg" ] && du -sk "node_modules/$pkg" 2>/dev/null | awk -v pkg="$pkg" '{kb=$1; if(kb>1024) {mb=kb/1024; size=sprintf("%.1fM", mb)} else {size=sprintf("%dK", kb)} printf "%-45s %7s  ", pkg, size; bar_len=int(kb/1000); if(bar_len<1) bar_len=1; if(bar_len>40) bar_len=40; for(i=0; i<bar_len; i++) printf "‚ñà"; print ""}'; done | sort -k2 -hr | head -30 && echo && echo "Total prod deps: $(npm ls --omit=dev --all --depth=Infinity 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]+' | sed 's/[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]//g' | sed 's/@[0-9].*//' | grep -v '^$' | sort -u | wc -l | xargs) packages"
scripts.deps:size:dev: echo 'Package                                        Size    Visual' && echo '(Dev dependencies only - excluding production)' && echo && comm -13 <(npm ls --omit=dev --all --depth=Infinity 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]+' | sed 's/[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]//g' | sed 's/@[0-9].*//' | grep -v '^$' | sort -u) <(npm ls --all --depth=Infinity 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]+' | sed 's/[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]//g' | sed 's/@[0-9].*//' | grep -v '^$' | sort -u) | while read pkg; do [ -d "node_modules/$pkg" ] && du -sk "node_modules/$pkg" 2>/dev/null | awk -v pkg="$pkg" '{kb=$1; if(kb>1024) {mb=kb/1024; size=sprintf("%.1fM", mb)} else {size=sprintf("%dK", kb)} printf "%-45s %7s  ", pkg, size; bar_len=int(kb/1000); if(bar_len<1) bar_len=1; if(bar_len>40) bar_len=40; for(i=0; i<bar_len; i++) printf "‚ñà"; print ""}'; done | sort -k2 -hr | head -30 && echo && echo "Total dev-only deps: $(comm -13 <(npm ls --omit=dev --all --depth=Infinity 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]+' | sed 's/[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]//g' | sed 's/@[0-9].*//' | grep -v '^$' | sort -u) <(npm ls --all --depth=Infinity 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]+' | sed 's/[‚îÇ‚îú‚îî‚îÄ‚î¨ ]//g' | sed 's/@[0-9].*//' | grep -v '^$' | sort -u) | wc -l | xargs) packages"
scripts.deps:size:all: du -sk node_modules/* node_modules/@*/* 2>/dev/null | sort -nr | head -80 | awk 'BEGIN{print "Package                                        Size    Visual"} {kb=$1; path=$2; gsub(/node_modules\//, "", path); if(kb>1024) {mb=kb/1024; size=sprintf("%.1fM", mb)} else {size=sprintf("%dK", kb)} printf "%-45s %7s  ", path, size; bar_len=int(kb/1000); if(bar_len<1) bar_len=1; if(bar_len>40) bar_len=40; for(i=0; i<bar_len; i++) printf "‚ñà"; print ""}' && echo && echo "Total: $(du -sh node_modules 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $1}')"
scripts.update:docs:deps-graph:layers: tsg --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --LR --abstraction src/domain --abstraction src/application --abstraction src/infrastructure --abstraction src/presentation --md docs/reports/dependencies/layers.md
scripts.update:docs:deps-graph:flow: tsg --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --LR --include src/presentation/cli.ts --include src/presentation/processor-factory.ts --include src/application/processor.ts --exclude src/domain --exclude node_modules --md docs/reports/dependencies/flow.md
scripts.update:docs:deps-graph:all: bun run update:docs:deps-graph:prod && bun run update:docs:deps-graph:test && bun run update:docs:deps-graph:layers && bun run update:docs:deps-graph:flow && bun run update:docs:deps-graph:external
scripts.update:docs:uml:all-layers: tsuml2 -g "src/**/*.ts" --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --mermaid "direction TB" --memberAssociations --outMermaidDsl docs/reports/diagrams/all-layers.mmd > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo "‚ùå Error generating all-layers diagram" && rm -f out.svg
scripts.update:docs:uml:core: tsuml2 -g "src/domain/**/*.ts" "src/application/**/*.ts" --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --mermaid "direction TB" --memberAssociations --outMermaidDsl docs/reports/diagrams/core.mmd > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo "‚ùå Error generating core diagram" && rm -f out.svg
scripts.update:docs:uml:infra: tsuml2 -g "src/infrastructure/**/*.ts" --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --mermaid "direction TB" --memberAssociations --outMermaidDsl docs/reports/diagrams/infra-detailed.mmd > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo "‚ùå Error generating infra diagram" && rm -f out.svg
scripts.update:docs:uml:all: bun run update:docs:uml:all-layers && bun run update:docs:uml:core && bun run update:docs:uml:infra
scripts.update:docs:all: echo 'üìù Updating documentation...' && (bun run update:docs:knip > /dev/null 2>&1 && bun run update:docs:deps-graph:all > /dev/null 2>&1 && bun run update:docs:uml:all > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '‚úÖ Documentation updated') || (echo '‚ùå Documentation update failed! Run the following commands for details:' && echo '  bun run update:docs:knip' && echo '  bun run update:docs:deps-graph:all' && echo '  bun run update:docs:uml:all' && exit 1)
scripts.ci: bun run lint && bun run format && bun run typecheck && bun run lint:check && bun run format:check && bun run build && bun run knip && bun run test:quiet && bun run update:docs:all
scripts.clean: rm -rf bun.lock node_modules releases dist coverage .*.bun-build tsconfig.tsbuildinfo output/chatgpt/*.md output/claude/*.md
scripts.clean:build: bun run clean:install && bun run ci
scripts.trigger:workflow:cd-homebrew-release: gh workflow run cd-homebrew-release.yml -f tag_name=v$(jq -r .version package.json)
scripts.example:chatgpt: rm -rf sandbox/chatgpt/output && bun src/presentation/cli.ts -i sandbox/chatgpt/chatgpt-conversations.json -o sandbox/chatgpt/output -p chatgpt
scripts.example:claude: rm -rf sandbox/claude/output && bun src/presentation/cli.ts -i sandbox/claude/claude-conversations.json -o sandbox/claude/output -p claude --since 2025-06-01 --no-split --dry-run
scripts.example:all: bun run example:chatgpt && bun run example:claude
